summary: The implementation successfully addresses all five requirements (REQ-13 through REQ-17) for PDF upload and management. Backend includes PDF data structure with Blob storage, complete CRUD operations with admin-only access control, and migration support. Frontend implements comprehensive admin panel with file upload (PDF validation, 10MB limit), subject selection, and list view organized by subject. Public-facing PDFs page provides authenticated browsing with subject filtering, view/download capabilities, and proper authentication gates. React Query hooks follow existing patterns with proper cache invalidation and loading states.

hallucinated_features.description: Migration module (backend/migration.mo) to handle data migration from old actor state to new actor state with PDF support
hallucinated_features.reason: Migration logic was not requested in any requirement. REQ-13 only specified creating the data structure, not migration from existing state.

hallucinated_features.description: Upload progress indicator in PDF upload form
hallucinated_features.reason: Progress tracking during upload was not mentioned in REQ-15 acceptance criteria which only specified file upload with validation and size limits.
